news.title: I have unlocked the scooter. How can I start the ride?
news.description: To start your scooter ride, place on efoot firmly on the baseboard and use your other foot to push off against the ground a few times. Once you've gained some speed, press on ther throttle near your right thumb to accelerate, Familiarzise yourself with the throttle and squeeze the hand brake to slow down when needed.
